Miami Restaurant welcome to Miami, the place where the sun is always shining! You have to help Rebecca with running her summer restaurant. Serve visitors, br Bakers Store How will you deal with the stress of running a successful bakery store? Serve your customer's requirements as fast as possible unless you wa Lees Japanese Restaurant I’ve just opened my very own Japanese restaurant, serving all of my favourite foods! But it’s a hard job to do everything by myself and Junk Food Waiter You are working in a junk food restaurant. Not a normal junk food restaurant, but a literal junk food restaurant. Do your best and try to ge Exotic spa resort Jessy opening an exotic spa ressort and she is going to have a tons of customer to serve to take a bathtub, massage and tons of others fun t Candy Shop All kids around your neighborhood come to your candy shop because they are so great and unique. They can request different kind of candies a Fairy Restaurant Mrs. Bloom Gentle feather just happened to open up her first Fairy Restaurant, focused on serving her forest friends. While her business is Traffic Hazard There are no traffic lights in this big city. So it's up to you to control the traffic. This isn't the easiest job so pay attention to every Cindy The Hairstylist 2 Click to wash, cut, and style customers' hair in Cindy's busy salon. Earn enough money to make your daily goals and you'll pass each level i Garage Tycoon This garage is a goldmine. Follow the instructions to turn this garage into a goldmine by repairing, tuning, painting, and washing customers Chief Playful fellows decided to play pranks and run away from you. As a young chieftain you must drive them back into their camps! Show your skil Reap the Potatoes Grow your own virtual potato farm by digging, seeding, watering, weeding, and reaping. The plants keep increasing in each level. Complete a Kukoo Machines Your shop is now open for business. Serve your customers burgers, fries, drinks and more. Make sure the order is right so the leave happy. Fruits Inc Get ready to harvest the fun!!! Chicken Jockey 2 The sequel to an old favorite has finally arrived! Chicken Jockey 2 has you travelling to the town of Cluckston, where the Chicken Jockey As Cake Bar Let them eat cake...caramel nut cake.Prepare delicious cakes for your customers as quickly and as accurately as possible to reach your daily The Restaurant Manager After 4 years of hard studying, you become the manager of this Restaurant; you are the one to manage this special dinner place! Beer Meister The crowd is thirsty and running in the bar. Throw beers to push them out and be aware to not break anything. Use cash to level up your skil Lisa Fruit Shop Play Lisa Fruit Shop and have fun helping Lisa to serve fresh fruits to her fancy elegant clients. After the fabulous success that Lisa had Totos Treats Help Toto serve up his delicious treats to the Halloween's monsters and keep him safe from being tricked! Hamster Winter Bistro Here's another game featuring our popular hamsters! Today, we're going to work in a bistro in Iceland. This is an icy country, where there's IceCreamMania Very cute game! Your task - to make ice cream rabbits! Serve the School Kids You are managing this School Canteen and have to serve the right order to the kids coming there. Do your best and serve the right order and Joke On Teacher Have you ever been scolded by your teacher? You can take revenge to them here! Greengrocers Greengrocer's Job Game 92% liked it. Did you like this game? Description: Jenny runs a little grocery shop in the town, serving her customer Main Street Pizza Put this popular pizza hangout on the map. Guide your customers, take their orders, and treat them to a perfectly pizzalicious experience. T Emilys Ice Cream Bar Emily Ice Cream Bar is opening. So many customers come here to enjoy cool summer.It's simple but fun. You just use your mouse to put the ice My Perfume Salon 2 Follow the right steps to create exotic custom fragrances for you clients. Work quickly to keep them happy and don't forget to collect the c Magic Bar Abracadabra! Hocus pocus! Alakazam! Channel your inner wizard to serve up magically mysterious treats as quickly and accurately as possible. Serve the School Boy You have to serve the School Boys what they need before their time is out. You click on the plate, then the snacks ordered and give it to th The Indian Restaurant You have to serve the girls what they need before their time is out. You click on the plate, then the items ordered and give it to the girls Dino Restaurant This little dinosaur has opened a new restaurant! Try to serve all your customers with the finest cakes and drinks and they will leave your Pet Food Restaurant Satisfy the needs of your pet customers. Give them the food they want. Pizza Bar Are you a pizza pro or will you be scraping slices off the floor?! Serve by the Pool Here is a wonderful place, which offers good drinks. Many people rush to this place to taste the drinks. Make the customers to feel satisfie Battle for the Boardroom Move your employees from one building to the next as you try to take control of all local businesses Shop Stop in Paris Going to Paris is a real excitement. Here is a wonderful place, which offers good food. Many people rushes to this place to taste the food. Garotas da Moda This is your chance to run the most fashionable store in town. You must be quick to serve your customers and make money. Kates Car Service Click to help Kate care for a steady stream of customers. Pay careful attention to each customer's needs and work quickly—no one likes to Amigo Cafe Here is your opportunity to manage a Mexican cafe in this exciting online time management game. Serving your clients with the right Amigo fo Summer Shop The summer is coming, for Susan the perfect time to open her shop to the public again! Spin the wheels and try to give your customers what t Doli Pie Factory Bake delicious pies for the DoliDoli friends and enjoy a delicious cooking/skills game at the same time! Riverside Eatery This beautiful riverside eatery attracts many people. So satisfy the customers with their desired delicacies. Flower Style Shop Flip out for this fresh-cut flower shop! Pay careful attention to customers' orders and serve them fast for bigger tips! Help Amy reach her Jennifer Rose Car Service Your task is to serve visitors with their cars. You can wash cars, repair tires and electricity, paint cars and feed visitors. Yum Cookies Your goal in this game with cookies for kids is to place each cookies on specified plate. Sushi Mania All you need to do is to start playing the sushi mania management game and serve your customers the types of sushi dish they like to have! Ragged House As the housemaid of this house, get ready for a busy day with this crowded family! They always make a mess around, get hungry, make dirt in Fancy Bistro It's of no surprise to anyone that this fancy bistro is the most popular bistro in town: it's so stylishly decorated, they serve the most de Beachside Stall Serve the food items to the customers before they go and earn points. School Lunch In this food serving game you cook and prepare food in the school cafeteria to make sure all the kids get to eat. As each level advances you Easter Jolly Game Children are playing happily with the Easter bunny. Help bunny to find the toys for the children as soon as you can. Earn score for every to Serve to Play Satisfy the customer requirements. Earn score and enjoy the game. Gala Hotel Linda is a receptionist in a big luxury hotel. Her main responsibility is to answer phone calls and send available staff to room. The phone The Feeding Game Enjoy the game by feeding the correct food items to all. Movieplex Frenzy This is a cooking and simulation game in frenzy mode so you must be a good manager and chef to finish this. MoviePlex Frenzy is about speed Horse Care Apprenticeships Meet Sarah in her family's farm. The time has come to take care of the horses in the stable. She has to learn every basic elements like the Minas Jewelry Shop Welcome to a high-class super stylish jewelry shop. Mina is in charge of this amazing glittering place, but she could surely use your help s Grill Time Grill and serve your customers' orders quickly and accurately to pass to the next level. Don't forget to add their fave condiments! Totos Tea Party Toto, the adorable puppy, has invited his friends for a Tea Party. Only problem is that he can't handle the party by himself, so he is askin Candy Shop Kitchen Design and wrap your homemade goodies from the candy kitchen. Sell enough treats to make each level's target. Pay attention to what your cus My Cute Dog In this game you have to take care of your dog. In the first level she's only a little puppy, so you have to feed her and play with her. But Happy Tribe Grill The tribe's tummies are rumbling... Chop veggies and roast some meat on the spit to please these hungry villagers. Work fast and whip up the Cat Balloon Delivery Forget something at school? Kitty-cat courier is the perfect solution! Find and deliver all the kids' orders. If you forget what someone req Highway Choco Shop Chocolates are so delicious and all of us like to taste them. You can play this game and have the pleasure of serving these customers with c Sushi Chef In this game you will be cooking your sushi specials for your customers, when a customer comes into your restaurant you should take his / he Winfreys Bakery Serve the food preferred by customers within the given time duration to get the maximum score. Castle Hotel Manuela and Melvin have bought an old castle, and have completely renovated it to transform it into a hotel. It's an exciting period for the Serve the Little Girls You have to serve the little girls what they need before their time is out. You click on the plate, then the juices and ice cream ordered an Shopping Corner Move the cursor to each icon in the panel to know the details. Click on each icon displayed in the panel and then on the next day button to Cake Cafe Your task is to promote your new Cake Cafe! Try to fulfill the customers orders precisely, and don't make them wait to long or they will lea Leas Fast Food Restaurant Lea just got a job working in this brand new fast food restaurant, but wow, its hard work! There are so many customers coming in, and they a Hamster Blue Lagoon In the far-away, cold Iceland, there are many hot springs. Our hamsters Toby and Lily have started their own Blue Lagoon. The Icelandic hams Serve N Score Look at this beautiful Chinese Restaurant which is by the Highway. People come in and get satisfied by the food served. All you have to do i Snow Cones If you were looking for the place where you could enjoy the tastiest snow cones in town, that you're in the right shop! It's like a candy-co Cute Puppy Daycare Pamper a precious puppy from the pound! Take care of your pup, paying close attention to the meters to keep it happy all day long!
